Author: pinkglitterbunny
Text: Isnt this all just so fucked lmao?? Also peter was so cute I loved him so much but why can’t I take the love I have for him... and give it to MYSELF.... anyway I’m just so glad someone relates

Author: shark_robinson
Text: OMG SAAAME except for me it was more with Miles. Why are we comparing ourselves to literal DRAWINGS the whole point of animation is to be able to show things you can’t with live action. Also as much as I liked the movie, it had so many fat jokes and they made me so self conscious because yeah I look more like Peter B. Parker with a belly/muffin top than Miles or Gwen. EDs are ridiculous.
